channel.title: Explision Revolution
channel.description:
Hi im Explisionist, im making a new server based off of my old source- A.M Explision, made by me and xstrxpurez.. its a dodian base, im currently adding where its 2 worlds, 1 for pvp and 1 for skilling/pking.
Its a 377 also.
So far-
[b]Pvp World[/b]
[ul][li]Pvp over the full world, with a 10 sec safe timer like in rs[/li] [li]full banking with withdrawing[/li] [li]Pvp combat zones such as- 3-34, etc..[/li] [li]Banks and shops are safe zones.[/li] [li]Full prayer, and pots[/li] [li]all specials work, even for the godswords.[/li] [li]Full mage, with correct animation[/li] [li]Full range with drawbacks, correct arrows, and animation, d bow hits 2 times and has correct special[/li][/ul]
[b]Regular World-[/b]
[ul][li]Full trading, and shops.[/li] [li]npc training, and the npcs use proper hits and dont glitch[/li] [li]full teleports to correct spots, all town teleports put u in random spots like rs.[/li] [li]All skills work besides construction[/li] [li]Full pking, with levels[/li][/ul]
Got an idea? post them here, i will respond and say if i will or not, you will be given credits.
Pvp pictures (Noncombat, combat will be posted later when i get a friend to come on)
Rs pvp- [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/35bwks6.png[/img]
Penalty for runners. [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/2nks9yq.png[/img]

item.title: Explision Revolution
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:6, topic:288517”]Quite easy to get Full PvP
Just remove all the Safe Zones if the Server is Based on Making the Safe Zones and not the Wilds.

But still Sounds good[/quote]
the pvp is based off of runescapes with like being lvl 3 and getting atted by ppl like lvl 33, or 20, etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Explision Revolution
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:2, topic:288517”]Sounds good
Good luck.:)[/quote]

Thanks, im hoping to have it done and released with in a week or two… i slimmed down the cpu usage, so its only running at 4% max, and handling up to 2k ppl on each world, with no lag…

Read full topic
